attributes.action: Ban All Anti Brish Demonstrations On Remebrance Sunday
attributes.additional_details:
We demand that the UK government takes action to prevent any and all anti British demonstrations on Remembrance Sunday by any group.

It is time the government of this country actually took a stand on behalf of the people who voted them into power and showed our heroes that they are proud of them rather than standing by and doing nothing while their memories are insulted.
